label: Videos
helpText: Assign students to watch a video related to the upcoming lesson before class.

label: Slide Presentations
helpText: Have students review a slide presentation at home to prepare for the lesson.

label: Storytelling
helpText: Ask students to write or read a story related to the lesson content at home.

label: Quizzes
helpText: Use online quizzes or questionnaires to assess students' prior knowledge before class.

label: Journaling
helpText: Have students write in their journals to reflect on their understanding of the upcoming topic.

label: Case Studies
helpText: Assign a case study for students to analyze and prepare for discussion in class.

label: Brainstorming
helpText: Ask students to brainstorm ideas at home and bring them to class.

label: Concept Mapping
helpText: Students create concept maps at home to organize their understanding of the topic.

label: WebQuest
helpText: Assign an online scavenger hunt where students gather information on the topic.

label: Problem Solving
helpText: Give students problems to solve at home to assess their understanding of the lesson material.

label: Discussion
helpText: Encourage students to participate in online discussions or forums related to the lesson.
